title: Very poor battery performance and heat up issue G Pixel 3XL
content:
I tried all the DIYs to fix the problem but it still remains. My G Pixel 3 XL battery lasts only 6-8 hours even if i don't use it keeps draining. Another issue which i have encountered today morning the phone was heating up i restarted than it was fine but please fix this battery issue. Its my first ever Android phone and am into my first week.
Thanks to help.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
